homepage.title: Architecture Database
homepage.subtitle: A comprehensive database for searching and browsing Japanese architectural works and architects
homepage.searchPlaceholder: Search by architectural work, architect, location, etc.
homepage.optimizedLoading: High-speed loading with optimized data (1-3 seconds)
homepage.networkSlow: Internet connection may be slow. Please wait and reload the page.

architecture.title: Architectural Works
architecture.description: Browse over 14,000 architectural work information from all over Japan. Detailed search by region, era, category, etc. is possible.

architects.title: Architects
architects.description: Contains information on over 2,900 architects. You can check detailed information such as career, work list, and affiliated office.

map.title: Map Display
map.description: Visually explore architectural works on a map. Discover nearby architectural works based on location information.
